prompt: Create a comprehensive map view page with a full-screen interactive map as the primary content. Include a top app bar with a title 'Map View' and a back navigation arrow. Add a floating action button positioned in the bottom-right corner with a location/GPS icon for current location functionality. The map should occupy the entire remaining screen space below the app bar. Use a clean, modern design with Material Design principles. The app bar should have a blue color scheme (Colors.blue) with white text and icons. The floating action button should use the primary blue color with a white GPS icon.
